name: Seijin Attack
description:
So this my first ever game done by using Unity and I actually look around Youtube and Google a lot but I glad I finally done it! 

So the Seijin Attack is a shooter game where you play as the baby seijin or monster and then evolve to bigger and stronger seijin upon revival. I took inspiration from Shin Godzilla and I just watched it for this Kaiju Mini Jam. Currently, there is only one form because I don't have enough time and need more experience.

I can't compose music or game sound yet so I used copyright free sources from:

Game BGM:
 https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCgrQkWWf_48rQm-x-dQ4_uA

Sound effects: https://freesound.org/
